cards.name: Barty Crouch
cards.flavorText: Barty Crouch was a stiff, upright, elderly man, dressed in an ipeccably crisp suit and tie.'
effect: Before each oppponent's turns, they may discard 1 of their Lessons from play. If they do not, your cards in play cannot be chosen until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Bulgaria Scores
cards.flavorText: ‘...and score Bulgaria’s first goal...'
effect:
Do 14 damage to an opponent.
When you build your deck, you can only put 1 Bulgaria Scores in it.

cards.name: Connolly and Quigley, Irish Beaters
cards.flavorText: ‘The Irish Beater Quigley swung heavily at a passing Bludger.'
effect: Once per turn, when you play a [Q] Spell with printed Power cost 8 or more, you may discard a [Q] card from your hand. If you do, choose an opponent's non-Lesson card in play and discard it.

cards.name: Death Eater
cards.flavorText: ‘“It’s what You-Know-Who’s supporters called themselves,” said Bill.'
effect: Once per turn, you may use an Action to count the number of Death Eaters you have in play. Do that much damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Fleeing the Grounds
effect: Before each of your turns, your opponent chooses 1 of their non-Lesson cards in play and puts it on the bottom of their deck.
to solve: Your opponent puts 3 cards from their hand on the bottom of their deck or they take 7 damage.
reward: Your opponent may choose 1 of your cards in play and return it to its owner's hand.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent puts 3 cards from their hand on the bottom of their deck or they take 7 damage.
cards.reward: Your opponent may choose 1 of your cards in play and return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Ginny, Youngest Weasley
cards.flavorText: ‘The other, who was small and red-haired, was Ron’s younger sister.'
effect: The first time each turn 1 of your cards is discarded from play, you may draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Green Comet Leprechauns
cards.flavorText: ‘The great shamrock dissolved, the leprechauns drifted down onto the field on the opposite side from the veela...'
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your F Lessons from play. When you play this card, you get 2 more Actions this turn. You may only play 1 Green Comet Leprechauns per turn.

cards.name: Krum, Bulgarian Seeker
cards.flavorText: ‘Viktor Krum was thin, dark, and sallow-skinned, with a large curved nose and thick black eyebrows. He looked like an over-grown bird of prey. It was hard to believe he was only eighteen.'
effect: Once per turn, whenever you discard 1 of your cards from play, your cards need 2 less Power to play until the end of the turn. (You still need at least 1 Power that matches.)

cards.name: Krum's Firebolt
effect: Once per turn, whenever you use an Action to play a Q card with printed Power cost of 8 or more, you get 1 more Action that turn.

cards.name: Lantern Lit Trail
cards.flavorText: ‘And then a deep, booming gong sounded somewhere beyond the woods, and at once, green and red lanterns blazed into life in the trees, lighting a path to the field.'
effect: Before each player's turn, they count the number of Lesson types they have in play. They draw that many cards.

cards.name: Ludo Bagman
cards.flavorText: ‘He had the look of a powerfully built man gone slightly to seed; the robes were stretched tightly across a large belly he surely had not had in the days when he had played Quidditch for England.'
effect: Before each of your turns, if an opponent drew more than 1 card during their last turn, you may draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Lynch, Irish Seeker
effect: At the end of each of your turns, if you played a [Q] Spell that turn, you may draw a card, and then you may put 1 [Q] Lesson from your hand into play.

cards.name: Melee of the Mascots
cards.flavorText: ‘Ministry wizards were flooding onto the field to separate the veela and the leprechauns, but with little success'
effect: Whenever 1 of your Creatures is discarded from play, that Creature does damage to an opponent equal to its damage per turn.

cards.name: Omnioculars
effect: The first time each turn an opponent would gain any Actions, instead you draw a card.

cards.name: Rain of Bludgers
effect:
Chose one:
- Discard all Items from play
- Discard all Characters from play
- Discard all Events from play
- Discard all Creatures from play
You may use an Action to repeat this effect.

cards.name: The Dark Mark
effect: Once during each of your turns, you may do 3 damage to yourself. If you do, search your deck. You may take a Dark card from your deck, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Touring the Tents
effect: Before each of your turns, you may put an Item card from your hand with printed Power cost less than or equal to your Power into play.

cards.name: Winky
cards.flavorText: ‘The creature, whose legs were so short they stuck out in front of it on the chair, was wearing a tea towel draped like a toga, and it had its face hidden in its hands.'
effect: Once per game, when an opponent would play a card, you may discard 3 cards from your hand. If you do, instead that card loses all abilites and is discarded.

cards.name: Winky's Thievery
cards.flavorText: ‘I is not doing magic with it, sir!” squealed Winky, tears streaming down the sides of her squashed and bulbous nose.'
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your P Lessons from play. Take control of an opponents card in play (except their starting Character) until the beginning of your next turn.

cards.name: Winners' Celebration
cards.flavorText: ‘Raucous singing was borne toward them on the night air as they retraced their steps along the lantern-lit path, and leprechauns kept shooting over their heads, cackling and waving their lanterns.'
effect: The first time an opponent draws 1 or more cards each turn, except during their draw step, they take that much damage.

cards.name: World Cup Match
effect: This Match can only be won by its "To Win" clause.
to win: Do 17 damage to opponents.
prize: The winner gets 1 more Action on each of their turns for the rest of the game (including the turn this Match is won).
cards.prize: The winner gets 1 more Action on each of their turns for the rest of the game (including the turn this Match is won).

cards.name: Zograf, Bulgarian Keeper
cards.flavorText: ‘As Mullet shot toward the goal posts yet again, clutching the Quaffle tightly under her arm, the Bulgarian Keeper, Zograf, flew out to meet her.'
effect: Once per game, when an opponent's card does damage to you, you may prevent that damage.

cards.name: Aurors Arrive
effect:
To play this card, discard 1 of your P Lessons from play.
Do 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of players and/or Creatures.

cards.name: Bagman's Deception
cards.flavorText: ‘For Fred and George had just scrambled over the backs of their seats and were standing in front of Luda Bagman with broad grins on their faces, their hands outstretched.'
effect: Your opponent cannot make progress toward a Match or win a Match.
to solve: Your opponent skips a total of 4 Actions.
reward: You take 4 damage.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent skips a total of 4 Actions.

cards.name: Broomstick Servicing Kit
effect: During your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, play a Q Item from your discard pile as if it were in your hand. If that Item was a Broom, you get 1 more Action this turn.

cards.name: Bundimun
effect:
To play this card, discard 1 of your F Lessons from play. 
When you play this card, you may choose an opponent's Item in play and discard it. Then do 2 damage to that opponent.

cards.name: Campfire Stories
effect:
To play this card, you may discard any number of cards from your hand. This card needs 1 less Power to play for each card discarded this way.

Before each of your turns, choose 1 based on the number of cards in your hand:
Less than 5 cards - Draw a card.
At least 5 cards - Do 3 damage to an opponent.
At least 8 cards - Do 5 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Dreams of Flying
effect: At the end of each of your turns, search your deck. You may take a [Q] Lesson from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.
to solve: Your opponent discard 5 of their cards from their hand and/or in play.
reward: You take 2 damage and your opponent may draw 2 cards.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent discard 5 of their cards from their hand and/or in play.
cards.reward: You take 2 damage and your opponent may draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Erumpent
effect: Once during each of your turns, when this card does damage to an opponent, you may discard another 1 of your Creatures from play. If you do, this card does 4 damage to that opponent.

cards.name: Inside the Tent
effect:
Choose one. If you have at least 5 Items in play, instead you may choose both.
-Draw 3 cards. Then each opponent draws 3 cards.
-You gain 2 more Actions this turn.

You may only play one Inside the Tent per turn.

cards.name: Krum Catches the Snitch
cards.flavorText: ‘“KRUM GETS THE SNITCH — BUT IRELAND WINS — good lord, I don’t think any of us were expecting that!'
effect: When you play this card, choose a card type. Whenever an opponent uses an Action to play a card of the chosen type, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Leprechaun
cards.flavorText: ‘Squinting up at the shamrock, Harry realized that it was actually comprised of thousands of tiny little bearded men with red vests, each carrying a minute lamp of gold or green.'
effect: When this card does damage to an opponent, you may discard it from play. If you do, you get 1 more Action this turn.

cards.name: Leprechaun Gold
effect: Before each of your turns, draw 2 cards, then discard 2 cards from your hand.

cards.name: Meeting Diggory
cards.flavorText: ‘Mr. Weasley was shaking hands with a ruddy-faced wizard with a scrubby brown beard, who was holding a moldy-looking old boot in his other hand.'
effect: Do 2 damage to an opponent. You may also choose a Creature in play and do 2 damage to it. Then draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Merchandise Cart
effect: Once during each of your turns, whenever another 1 of your non-Lesson cards is discarded from play, you get 1 more Action this turn.

cards.name: Muggle Marionettes
cards.flavorText: ‘High above them, floating along in midair, four struggling figures were being contorted into grotesque shapes.'
effect:
When you play this card, do 2 damage to yourself. Then choose a Character an opponent controls. 

Before that opponent's turn, they may take 4 damage. If they do not, that Character loses all abilities until the end of that turn.

cards.name: Porskoff Ploy
cards.flavorText: ‘Troy made as though to dart upward with the Quaffle, drawing away the Bulgarian Chaser Ivanova and dropping the Quaffle to Moran.'
effect: Count the number of Q Spells in your discard pile with printed Power cost 8 or more. Do that much damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Portkey
effect: Choose an Event or Location in play and discard it. Search your deck or discard pile. You may take a non-Healing Event or Location with printed Power cost less than or equal to your Power and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Quick Camp Kit
effect: Before each of your turns, you may draw a card for each other Item you have in play.

cards.name: Quidditch Stadium
cards.flavorText: ‘A hundred thousand witches and wizards were taking their places in the seats, which rose in levels around the long oval field.'
effect:
Players may look at the top card of their deck anytime.

Players may play Q cards from the top of their deck as if they were in their hand.

cards.name: Swelling Slug
effect: Whenever you draw 1 or more cards, except during your draw step, put a counter on this card. This card's damage per turn is equal to the number of counters on it.

cards.name: Tents Ablaze
cards.flavorText: ‘Once or twice Harry saw one of the marchers blast a tent out of his way with his wand. Several caught fire. The screaming grew louder.'
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your P Lessons from play. Whenever an opponent uses an Action to play an Item, if they have any other Items in play, they choose 1 of them and discard it.

cards.name: Tough Beaters
effect:
Choose 1. If you have at least 2 [Q] cards in play, instead choose up to 2:
- Choose an opponent. During their next turn, prevent the next 6 damage done to you.
- Do 4 damage to an opponent. Draw 4 cards.
- Choose a card type. Each opponent chooses 1 of their cards of that type in play and discards it.

cards.name: Wide Awake with Worry
effect:
Do 4 damage to an opponent.

At the end of each of your turns, if this card is in your discard pile and you took damage that turn, you may put this card into your hand. You may only return 1 Wide Awake With Worry from your discard pile to your hand this way each turn.

cards.name: Wronski Feint
cards.flavorText: ‘He saw Krum’s face contorted with concentration as he pulled out of the dive just in time, while Lynch was flattened, and he understood — Krum hadn’t seen the Snitch at all, he was just making Lynch copy him.'
effect: Do 4 damage to an opponent. You get 1 more Action this turn. You can only play 1 Wronski Feint each turn.

cards.name: Alluring Dance
cards.flavorText:
‘The veela had started to dance, and Harry’s mind had gone com-
pletely and blissfully blank.'
effect:
Choose a Character in play. It looses all abilities until the begining of your next turn.
Then count the number of Creatures in play. Do that much damage to each opponent.

cards.name: Bagman's Gamble
effect: Draw 2 cards, then reveal your hand. Count the number of Lesson cards in your hand. Do twice that much damage to each opponent.

cards.name: Billywig
effect: When you play this card, discard a card from your hand, then draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Biting Gnome
effect: Whenever you discard a card from your hand or a card you control from play, this card does 1 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Blackboard Advertisements
cards.flavorText: ‘Gold writing kept dashing across it as though an invisible giant’s hand were scrawling upon the blackboard and then wiping it off again.'
effect: Once per turn, you may use an Action to count the number of Items you have in play. Do that much damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Bludger to the Face
effect: Do 5 damage to an opponent. They may prevent this damage by discarding 2 cards from their hand.

cards.name: Borrowed Tent
effect:
When you play this card, your cards need 1 less Power to play until the end of this turn.

You may use an Action and discard this card from play. If you do, search your deck. You may take an Item card from your deck, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Box of Portkeys
cards.flavorText: ‘Who threw it into a large box of used Portkeys beside him; Harry could see an old newspaper, an empty drinks can, and a punctured football.'
effect: Play a non-Healing Item from your discard pile as if it were in your hand without using any Actions.

cards.name: Bulgarian Fans
effect: At the end of each of your turns, each opponent that has 3 or more Creatures in play chooses 1 of them and discards it.

cards.name: Cannon Pride
effect:
Choose 1 based on the number of cards you drew this turn:
at least 2 - do 3 damage to an opponent
at least 4 - do 6 damge to an opponent
at least 6 - do 9 damage to an opponent

cards.name: Child's Broom
effect: (Childs Broom isn't really a Broom.)

cards.name: Death Eater Mask
effect:
When you play this card, do 2 damage to yourself.
If you would discard 1 of your Characters from play due to an opponent's card, discard this card instead.

cards.name: Deletrius
cards.flavorText: ‘“Deletrius!” Mr. Diggory shouted, and the smoky skull vanished in a wisp of smoke.'
effect: Choose 1 of your non-Healing cards in play and an opponent's card in play. Return them both to their owner's hand.

cards.name: Deliberate Collision!
cards.flavorText: “Foul!” echoed Ludo Bagman’s magically magnified voice. “Dimitrov skins Moran — deliberately flying to collide there — and it’s got to be another penalty — yes, there’s the whistle!”
effect: Do 4 damage to an opponent. If you did damage to an opponent this turn, instead do 6 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Delight of the Death Eaters
cards.flavorText: ‘More wizards were joining the marching group, laughing and pointing up at the floating bodies.'
effect:
Do 2 damage to yourself.
Choose an opponent's Character, Item, or Event in play and discard it.

cards.name: Distracted Referee
cards.flavorText: ‘Hassan Mostafa had landed right in front of the dancing veela, and was acting very oddly indeed.'
effect: Do 4 damage to an opponent, then choose a non-Lesson card type. Until the beginning of your next turn, opponents cannot play cards of the chosen type.

cards.name: Diversion!
effect: Do 5 damage to an opponent. Then they choose a card in their hand and put it on top of their deck.

cards.name: Final Score
cards.flavorText: ‘The scoreboard was flashing BULGARIA: 160, IRELAND: 170 across the crowd, who didn’t seem to have realized what had happened.'
effect: Do 8 damage to an opponent. If you win a Match this way, that opponent discards 3 cards from their hand.

cards.name: Finals Program
effect:
When you play this card, search your deck. You may take a Beater, Chaser, Keeper, or Seeker card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

You may use an Action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Firefly
effect:
When you play this card, search your deck. You may take a Beater, Chaser, Keeper, or Seeker card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

You may use an Action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Firewhisky
effect:
You may use an Action to discard 1 of your [P] Lessons from play or your hand. If you do, choose 1: 
- This card Provides: [P][P][P] until the end of the turn
- Put up to 4 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck in any order
- Do 4 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Flying Carpet Embargo
cards.flavorText: “Ali Bashir’s on the warpath. He wants a word with you about your embargo on flying carpets.” - Mr. Crouch
effect: Your opponent's Items and Events need 2 more Power to play.
to solve: Your opponent discards 8 of their cards from their hand and/or in play.
reward: Your opponent may put up to 2 Lessons cards from their discard pile into play.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent discards 8 of their cards from their hand and/or in play.
cards.reward: Your opponent may put up to 2 Lessons cards from their discard pile into play.

cards.name: Flying with the Cannons
effect: Whenever you play 1 or more Lessons, put a counter on this card. Then if there are 3 or more counters on this card, discard this card from play. If you do, search your deck. Take up to 2 [Q] Lessons from your deck and put them into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Fwooper
effect: When this card is discard from play, you may put a non-Healing Creature card in your discard pile with printed Power cost of 4 or less into play.

cards.name: Gifts of Gold
cards.flavorText: ‘“Excellent!” yelled Ron as the shamrock soared over them, and heavy gold coins rained from it, bouncing off their heads and seats.'
effect: Each opponent draws 4 cards. Then you draw 4 cards.

cards.name: Hanging Shamrocks
cards.flavorText: ‘They had walked into a patch of tents that were all covered with a thick growth of shamrocks...'
effect:
When you play this card, draw a card, then discard a card from your hand.

When this card is discarded from play, put it into your hand

cards.name: Interrogation
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your P Lessons from play. Name a non-Lesson card and choose an opponent. They reveal their hand and discard all cards that share a name with the chosen card.

cards.name: Ireland Scores!
cards.flavorText: “TROY SCORES!” roared Bagman, and the stadium shuddered with a roar of applause and cheers. “Ten zero to Ireland!”
effect: Do 6 damage to an opponent. Then, if they have any non-Lesson cards in play, they choose 1 of them and discard it.

cards.name: Malfoy's Sinister Warning
cards.flavorText: “Granger, they’re after Muggles,” said Malfoy. “D’you want to be showing off your knickers in midair? Because if you do, hang around . . . they’re moving this way, and it would give us all a laugh.”
effect:
Do 2 damage to yourself.
Do 5 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Mascot Introductions
cards.flavorText: ‘“And now, without further ado, allow me to introduce . . . the Bulgarian National Team Mascots!” - Ludo Bagman'
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Creature cards from play. Search your deck. You may put up to 2 non-Advanced Lesson cards from your deck into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Model Broomstick
effect: When this card is discarded from play, you may play an Item with printed Power cost of 5 or more from your hand without using any Actions.

cards.name: Morsmordre
cards.flavorText: ‘And something vast, green, and glittering erupted from the patch of darkness Harry’s eyes had been struggling to penetrate; it flew up over the treetops and into the sky.'
effect: Do 5 damage to an opponent. If you did damage to yourself this turn, instead do 8 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Muggle Artifact
effect: Whenever you activate the effect of 1 of your Items in play, do 2 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Prior Incantato
cards.flavorText: “Well, we’ll soon see,” growled Mr. Diggory, looking unimpressed. “There’s a simple way of discovering the last spell a wand performed, elf, did you know that?”
effect: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put any number of Lessons revealed this way into play and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Rennervate
cards.flavorText:
‘Winky stirred feebly. Her great brown eyes opened and she
blinked several times in a bemused sort of way.'
effect: To play this card, return 1 of your P Lessons from play to your hand. Shuffle up to 9 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Sharp Eyed Seeker
effect:
Choose 1. If you have at least 2 [Q] cards in play, instead choose up to 2:
- Draw 5 cards.
- Put up to 3 Q Lesson cards from your hand into play.
- Do damage to each opponent equal to half the number of Q Lessons you have in play.

cards.name: Silhouettes in the Smoke
effect: Whenever you take damage during your turn, do 2 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Slow Motion Viewing
cards.flavorText: ‘Harry spun a small dial on the side of his Omnioculars and slowed the players down enough to read the word “Firebolt” on each of their brooms and see their names, embroidered in silver, upon their backs.'
effect: Do 5 damage to an opponent. If there is a Match in play, the first card that requires Power that opponent plays on their next turn needs 3 more Power to play.

cards.name: Synchronized Chasers
effect:
Choose 1. If you have at least 1 [Q] card in play, instead choose up to 2:
- Do 4 damage to an opponent.
- Choose an opponent. They choose a non-Lesson card they control and discard it.
- Until the end of your turn, your [Q] cards need 2 less power to play.

cards.name: Trick Wand
effect: When you play this card, choose a non-Unique Item or Creature in play. This card becomes a copy of the chosen card.

cards.name: Veela
cards.flavorText: ‘Veela were women . . . the most beautiful women Harry had ever seen . . . except that they weren’t — they couldn’t be — human.'
effect: If an opponent has at least 1 Character in play other than their starting Character, Veela does 2 more damage to them.

cards.name: Veela Fireballs
cards.flavorText: ‘One of the veela had thrown a handful of fire and set his broom tail alight.'
effect: Do 3 damage divided as you choose among any number of players and/or Creatures. Then draw a card.

cards.name: Weasley Ghoul
cards.flavorText: ‘The rain sounded even louder at the top of the house, accompanied by loud whistlings and moans from the wind, not to mention sporadic howls from the ghoul who lived in the attic.'
effect: When you play this card, discard 1 of your Creatures from play.

cards.name: Winky's Empty Seat
cards.flavorText:
‘“Master — master wants me to save him a seat, Harry Potter.
He is very busy." -Winky'
effect: Do 4 damage to an opponent. If you have drawn at least 3 cards this turn, instead do 7 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Wizard Robes
effect: Once per turn, you may use an Action to count the number of cards in your hand. Do half that much damage (rounded up) to an opponent.
